oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1987 Report of the Executive Director to the NAACP National Board of Directors
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; NAACP; Gibson, William F.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A report issued by Benjamin L. Hooks and William F. Gibson to the NAACP National Board of Directors on October 24, 1987, at the Excelsior Hotel in Little Rock, Arkansas.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Gibson, William F.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Matthew Hicks and Katie Jakovich; Donated by Patricia Hooks Gray;
